Articles.Content:
This thread is for Fans of Kurtjmac only, if u have nothing to say nice then dont say it at all.

Stay on Topic, and maybe give a few Ideas to Kurt, i will also being uploading New videos that he makes on this thread encase you cant find them on youtube, or something went wrong with youtube or something. This gives more space and area for people to reply to his videos. Last but not least this thread is for KSP Kurt VID only!

Link to Kurt Youtube Site: http://www.youtube.com/user/kurtjmac

Latest VID by Kurt: Kerbal Space Program - 40# - Possible Design Flaw

Previous Kurt VID: Version 0.17! 039#

Edited September 29, 2012 by cocomoe1002
Link!
just watching this. i dont think he knows the aerospikes are for rockets LOL

just watching this. i dont think he knows the aerospikes are for rockets LOL

They can be very usefull in some situations but not in this xD lol

I like Kurt's comment so much. They fit the Kerbal universe quite well.

"Greanary* is about to have an interesting day"

"He's flipping out. WooOOOoooOOO. OK"

"I think that could be good" (100% Kerbal way)

"I like this design,[...] but I think I'm gonna have to come up with a larger version of it" (Kerbal at core!)

"Hopefully that will not cause any problems"

"Failed, but had some engineering success"

*Couldn't read his name
How does he get the shadows? I don't have shadows and I can't seem to locate such a feature in the options.
lol i love how he had the take off where it actually fooled him into thinking he would takke off that time,
